p:
All DFT calculations were carried out with the BAND program package
37– 41 , using the PBE density functional
42 , Grimme van der Waals corrections
43 , and scalar relativistic corrections. A triple-ζ plus polarization basis set was used for the valence orbitals, while the core orbitals were kept frozen in the same state as in the free atoms. In general, default settings of the BAND program were used. The Self-Consistent Field convergence criterion was set at 10 −6 Hartree atomic units, while the geometrical optimization criterion was set at 10 −2 Hartree per nanometer.
